mainSequence.step: User requests to display all data of an application.
UI activates to display application data.
Controller requests all applications from Repository.
Repository returns Iterable of job applications.
Controller processes the list of applications and sends it to UI.
UI displays the list of applications to the User.
User selects a specific application for detailed view.
UI activates to handle the application selection.
Controller retrieves data of the selected application from Repository.
Repository provides the details of the selected job application.
Controller sends the job application data to UI.
UI displays the details of the application data to the User.
